meanings.definition: The phenomenon of a plant having different types of leaves on the same plant.
meanings.sent1: Heterophylly can be seen in some plants where the leaves look very different from each other.
meanings.sent2: The garden displayed heterophylly with its mix of large and small leaves on the same plant.
meanings.sent3: The plant's heterophylly made it seem like it couldn't decide on a leaf style.
meanings.sent4: In the world of plants, heterophylly is like having a wardrobe full of diverse leaf outfits.
meanings.sent5: The concept of heterophylly is like a leafy puzzle where each piece is unique.

meanings.definition: The condition of having leaves that vary in shape or size.
meanings.sent1: The heterophylly of the tree made it stand out in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of heterophylly lies in the diversity of leaf shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent3: The gardener chuckled at the plant's heterophylly, as if the leaves were playing dress-up.
meanings.sent4: Heterophylly in the garden was a colorful mosaic of leaf variations.
meanings.sent5: The uniqueness of heterophylly in nature is like a gallery showcasing leaf diversity.
